articles.description: Lazarte has only been at Benchmark for two years. He backed startups like Mercor, HeyGen, and Decart AI.

articles.title: Intel continues to pull back on its manufacturing projects
articles.description: Intel canceled multiple manufacturing projects in Europe and delayed its Ohio chip plant for the second time this year.

articles.description: X is piloting a new feature that will help to identify the platform's best posts. The system is similar to how Community Notes fact-checking works.

articles.title: Snapchat will now let your friends know you’ve made it home safe
